title: How to Set Up Your Voicemail on Android

steps.title: Open your Android’s Phone app.
steps.content: Open your Android’s Phone app. It usually looks like a phone receiver at the bottom of the home screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press and hold the 1 key on the keypad.
steps.content: Press and hold the 1 key on the keypad. [2] X Research source

steps.title: If it’s your first time setting up voicemail, you’ll likely see a message that says “To set up voicemail, go to Menu > Settings”.
steps.content: If it’s your first time setting up voicemail, you’ll likely see a message that says “To set up voicemail, go to Menu > Settings”. Tap OK on the message prompt. If pressing this button dials your voicemail service, listen to the prompts for instructions on completing the setup process.

steps.title: To go to call settings, Tap the three vertical dots on top right of screen and then tap Settings.
steps.content: To go to call settings, Tap the three vertical dots on top right of screen and then tap Settings . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Voicemail option.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Voicemail option. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Advanced Settings.
steps.content: Tap Advanced Settings . [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Service.
steps.content: Tap Service . It’s the first option in the list. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Setup.
steps.content: Tap Setup . You should now see an area labeled “Voicemail number” with the value “Not set.”

steps.title: Type your mobile phone number and tap OK.
steps.content: Type your mobile phone number and tap OK . You are now ready to set up your voicemail.

steps.title: Return to the phone app.
steps.content: Return to the phone app. Try tapping the back button until you see the keypad. If this doesn’t work, tap the Phone icon on the home screen. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Press and hold the 1 key on the keypad.
steps.content: Press and hold the 1 key on the keypad. This will dial your voicemail .

steps.title: Listen to and follow the instructions to complete the process.
steps.content: Listen to and follow the instructions to complete the process. The rest of the steps will vary by provider, but you’ll usually be asked to set up an outgoing greeting , configure a password, and select some playback settings. [8] X Research source To check your voicemail in the future, tap and hold 1 , or tap the voicemail notification on the screen.
